_header: In the beginning of this deed
_description: A collection of 136 proverbs, written first in Latin and then translated — 973 lines, in stanzas of 4-8 lines per proverb

StGeorgEII.Editions:
Horrall,  Sarah M. 
             “Latin and Middle English Proverbs in a Manuscript at St. George’s
                Chapel, Windsor Castle.” 
             Mediaeval Studies
         45 (1983): 343-84: 343.

BodEngmiscc291.First Lines:
If þi pore frende gif þe with loueli hend
                    …
BodEngmiscc291.Last Lines:
…þat in pes will lifals þing askis &
                    tyme
